program.name: glib
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix4*) CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:"
# We do not want to -D_LINUX_SOURCE_COMPAT for stpcpy() export ac_cv_func_stpcpy=no ;; *-aix*) CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux10*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ARGS="--disable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -ieee -msym -readonly_strings" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ARGS="--enable-threads" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:=-O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${LIBICONV+-I${LIBICONV_INC}} -I${GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="${LIBICONV+-L${LIBICONV_LIB}} -L${GETTEXT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${GETTEXT_LIB}${LIBICONV_LIB+:${LIBICONV_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --enable-static --enable-shared \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --with-html-dir="${_docdir}" \ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+--with-libiconv-prefix=${SB_VAR_LIBICONV}} \ --with-libintl-prefix=${SB_VAR_GETTEXT} ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
for _pc in glib-2.0.pc gmodule-2.0.pc gobject-2.0.pc gthread-2.0.pc; do sed -e "s!-L\([^ ][^ ]*\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" \ -e "s! *-lintl *-liconv!!" ${_pc} >/tmp/$$ cp /tmp/$$ ${_pc} && rm -f /tmp/$$ done

item.para: Omit helper process for GSpawn when possible
Accept / as well as \ as a pathname separators in path handling functions
Fix g_strdup_printf to be locale sensitive
Add support for AIX 4.3.3. While stpcpy() is in libc, the prototype is not available unless you -D_LINUX_SOURCE_COMPAT. Because it was introduced in ML7, we refrain for backwards compatibility.
Force usage of GNU gettext and iconv
Backport glib/gnulib (v)snprintf functions from 2.4 to resolve text failures
